Title: Pictorial explanation of the First Five Year Plan (1953-1957) for the development of the national economy of our nation
Designer: General Political Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (中国人民解放军总政治部)
Notes: "Pictorial explanation of the First Five Year Plan (1953-1957) for the development of the national economy of our nation" (我国发展国民经济的第一个五年(1953-1957)计划图解) is a series of 12 posters, ca. 1955, possibly incomplete.This first sheet, "Strive to fully realize the first five-year plan" (为全部实现第一个五年计划而奋斗) shows Mao Zedong going over his report over the first Five Year Plan; below, "Schematic sketch of the main construction projects in our nation's first five-year plan" (我国第一个五年计划主要建设示意略图) is a map indicating where various larger projects are located. Soviet assistance is mentioned.
